Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Troy in 1977...
Injured on 6/21/1979 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1982, off Leroy Snapp (HAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/1982, off Warner Cannaday (DIA)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Second Base in 1982...
Injured on 5/18/1984 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Coney Island on 9/14/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1986, hitting .440 with 5 HR, 14 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/14/1988 to a 4-year deal worth $5,596,100 per year...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1988, hitting .302 with 7 HR, 30 RBI...
